title: BGP telemetry event
description: Canonical telemetry event emitted by the Red Lantern BGP attack-chain simulator. This schema defines the contract between simulated attacks and detection tooling such as Wazuh.

event_type.description: High-level classification of the event (e.g. bgp.update, bgp.withdraw, routing.anomaly)

timestamp.description: Simulated time in seconds since scenario start

feed.description: Originating feed or generator (e.g. ris, routeviews, router-syslog, mock)

observer.description: Logical observer emitting the event (sensor, collector, router, simulator)

attributes.description: Event-specific attributes. Contents depend on event_type.
